statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{11.23}; top has length \displaystyle{10.60}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{9.33} and \displaystyle{9.22}. The height is \displaystyle{9.13}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{10.60}+{9.22}+{11.23}+{9.33}={40.38}.
